readme:
# Boreal Syntax Theme
![istantanea_2018-12-07_18-49-21](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40722053/49664032-f0dad100-fa50-11e8-8d80-99bea3eeb526.png)

The boreal syntax theme is a refreshing, light syntax theme for the Atom editor. For best results, use it with darker UI themes such as the boreal-ui theme (check it out!). 

# Install
Install the boreal syntax theme via Atom by going to Preferences/Settings > Install and search for boreal-syntax (search under 'Themes'), or run in your terminal window:
`apm install boreal-syntax`

# Feedbacks/Help
If you liked/used this theme please make sure to leave a comment/suggestion to help me improve and update it even more!

If you'd like to collaborate with me, please send an e-mail to nori.filippo@gmail.com. Thank you!
